NAME=ola2pd
SRCS=main.cpp
# user defined compiler flags
# UFLAGS += -D FLEXT_THREADS

# user defined linker flags
 LDFLAGS += -L/usr/local/lib -lola -lpthread

# FLEXT HEADERS

# multithreading

BUILDTYPE=multi

# Type mode of the release
# KNOWN ISSUE: Changing this to release will crash Pure Data at library load

BUILDMODE=debug
